data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Etah, Uttar Pradesh, India will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Etah, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Etah.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary: On average, 144 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Etah, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Etah.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 19,520 believers in the county of Etah to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Gadaria Nikhad people might believe through him.
Father, let those from the 19,520 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,733,450, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Etah, Uttar Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Etah
location.people_groups_list: Jat Deswal, Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Rikhisur, Brahmin Sanadhya, Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Deswal (74,000), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions) (1,800), Brahmin Rikhisur (52,000), Brahmin Sanadhya (2,706,000), Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) (273,000)
